MemberSignature.Value: public override void RenderBeginHyperlink (string targetUrl, bool encodeUrl, string softkeyLabel, bool implicitSoftkeyLabel, bool mapToSoftkey);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void RenderBeginHyperlink(string targetUrl, bool encodeUrl, string softkeyLabel, bool implicitSoftkeyLabel, bool mapToSoftkey) cil managed

Docs.param: The URL target.
Set to if the URL is encoded.
The softkey text to use for the link if the mapToSoftkey parameter is set to .

Set to if the softkey label comes from the adapter itself (the default label, or something else that is adapter-specified, such as "Call" for a control), rather than being a softkey label explicitly specified by the application author.
Set to if mapping to a softkey on the device.
Docs.summary: Begins rendering a hyperlink element. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This call can be followed by calls to render text or by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderImage%2A> method to render the hyperlink contents, followed by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndHyperlink%2A> method.

Docs.exception:
the writer has already begun to write a hyperlink,
-or-
the response is a postback.
